sentences.sContent: In Maine, the most commonly counted roadkill species is the North American porcupine.
sentences.sContent_eng: In Maine, the most commonly counted roadkill species is the North American porcupine.
sentences.sCn: 在缅因州，公路交通事故中杀死的动物种类是北美箭猪。

sentences.sContent: Not like porcupine needles or anything, but small pointy projections on the surface that basically make the organ bumpy.
sentences.sContent_eng: Not like porcupine needles or anything, but small pointy projections on the surface that basically make the organ bumpy.
sentences.sCn: 它不像豪猪的刺或其它什么的，但是在表面上有尖状的凸起使这个器官起伏不平。

sentences.sContent: Lang wears so much product in his hair that when he sways in rapture to his playing his head looks like a porcupine in a typhoon.
sentences.sContent_eng: Lang wears so much product in his hair that when he sways in rapture to his playing his head looks like a porcupine in a typhoon.
sentences.sCn: 郎朗总是对他的头发大做文章，每次表演到行头上时，他的脑袋看上去就像在台风中乱窜的一只箭猪。

trans.tranOther: an animal with long sharp parts growing all over its back and sides
